briefTitle: Impact of Robot-assisted Radical Prostatectomy Technique on Short-term Continence Recovery
officialTitle: The Impact of Retzius-sparing Approach for Robot-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy on Short-term Continence Recovery: Randomized Controlled Trial
summary: To assess and compare the short-term post-operative continence recovery rate in two cohorts of men undergoing Robot Assisted Radical Prostatectomy (RARP), each randomized to undergo RARP with Vattikuti Institute technique or Retzius sparing technique.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: One week after the removal of the suprapubic urinary catheter
